## Project Overview
This is a React + TypeScript frontend built with Vite, featuring three distinct dashboards for different user roles.

## Architecture
- **Framework**: React 19 with TypeScript
- **Build Tool**: Vite 7
- **Routing**: React Router v6
- **Structure**: Feature-based organization with /admin, /operator, and /user routes

## Development Guidelines
- Follow React best practices and functional components with hooks
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Maintain clean separation between app/, dashboards/, components/, and services/
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Place shared components in components/
- Place API logic in services/
- Place custom hooks in hooks/
- Place type definitions in types/
